ComicInfo.Summary:
Well-Traveled!: A henpecked husband dis-members his wife after she refuses to let him spend money on toy trains once too often.
Hate!: A man goes along with a plan to set fire to a Jewish couple's home until his mother tells him he's adopted and that his natural parents were Jews.
What Fur?!: Captain Limpfort is hired by a furrier to fly him to a planet in another Solar System in order for the furrier to trap and skin skunks, which he makes into fashion apparel. They soon learn that the planet is inhabited by aliens who skin humans for their pelts!
Cold Cuts!: A man murders his wife and cuts up her body in the tub to store in the meat locker. His plans to dispose of the remains are continually frustrated until his friend invites him for dinner, and, after he's taken a bite, reveals to him that he borrowed the meat from the locker.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Jack Davis,Jack Kamen,Joe Orlando,Wally Wood,Jack Kamen,Wally Wood,Joe Orlando,Jack Davis
ComicInfo.Inker: Jack Davis,Jack Kamen,Joe Orlando,Wally Wood,Jack Kamen,Wally Wood,Joe Orlando,Jack Davis
ComicInfo.Title: Well-Traveled!; Hate!; What Fur?!; Cold Cuts!
ComicInfo.Characters: Jack Bailey (Horace's neighbor),Philip Bailey (Jack's son),Bess Weems (Horace's wife, death),Horace Weems (villain)
